meanings.definition: A person who deserts and betrays an organization, country, or set of principles.
meanings.sent1: The renegados were once loyal members of the team.
meanings.sent2: The renegados abandoned their cause without warning.
meanings.sent3: The renegados decided to switch sides in the middle of the game.
meanings.sent4: The renegados' actions left a trail of broken trust behind them.
meanings.sent5: The renegados' betrayal was felt by all who trusted them.

meanings.definition: To desert or betray an organization, country, or set of principles.
meanings.sent1: She renegados on her promise to support the project.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers renegados their duty and fled the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: He renegados on his friends by revealing their secret.
meanings.sent4: The politician renegados on his campaign promises.
meanings.sent5: The employee renegados on the company by leaking confidential information.
